chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad), lower_fix_point bool (ensemble_base state d) (lemd d) (predta_coacc d a) (predta_coacc_states d a)

Premises:
lemd = fun (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 : Map bool) => ensemble_base state d m0 /\ ensemble_base state d m1 /\ lem m0 m1 : preDTA -> mRelation bool
predta_coacc = fun (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (m : Map bool) => map_replace bool (predta_coacc_0 d d m) a true : preDTA -> ad -> Map bool -> Map bool
ensemble_base : forall A : Set, Map A -> Map bool -> Prop
ad = N : Set
state = Map prec_list : Set
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
preDTA = Map state : Set
predta_coacc_states = fun (d : preDTA) (a : ad) => power (Map bool) (predta_coacc d a) (map_mini state d) (S (MapCard state d)) : preDTA -> ad -> Map bool
lower_fix_point : forall A : Set, mEnsemble A -> mRelation A -> (Map A -> Map A) -> Map A -> Prop
predta_coacc_increasing : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad), increasing_app bool (lemd d) (predta_coacc d a)
predta_coacc_reverse : forall (n : nat) (d : preDTA) (a b : ad), MapGet bool (power (Map bool) (predta_coacc d a) (map_mini state d) n) b = Some true -> coacc d a b
lattice_lemd_bounded_3 : forall (p : prechain bool) (d : preDTA), chain bool (ensemble_base state d) (lemd d) p -> chain bool (ensemble_base state d) lem p
lattice_lemd_bounded : forall (p : prechain bool) (d : preDTA), sas_chain bool (ensemble_base state d) (lemd d) p -> sas_chain bool (ensemble_base state d) lem p
lattice_bounded : forall d : preDTA, bounded_sas_chain bool (ensemble_base state d) (lemd d) (S (MapCard state d))
predta_coacc_states_0 = fun (d : preDTA) (a : ad) => lazy_power bool eqm_bool (predta_coacc d a) (map_mini state d) (S (MapCard state d)) : preDTA -> ad -> Map bool
lattice_lemd_bounded_0_def = fun p : prechain bool => forall d : preDTA, chain bool (ensemble_base state d) (lemd d) p -> chain bool (ensemble_base state d) lem p : prechain bool -> Prop
predta_coacc_contain_coacc_ads_3 : forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), coacc d a0 a1 -> preDTA_ref_ok d -> exists n : nat, MapGet bool (power (Map bool) (predta_coacc d a0) (map_mini state d) n) a1 = Some true
in_M2_disj : forall (A : Set) (a : A) (m0 m1 : Map A), (exists c : ad, MapGet A (M2 A m0 m1) c = Some a) -> (exists c : ad, MapGet A m0 c = Some a) \/ (exists c : ad, MapGet A m1 c = Some a)
predta_coacc_contain_coacc_ads_def_0 = fun (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) => coacc d a0 a1 -> preDTA_ref_ok d -> exists n : nat, MapGet bool (power (Map bool) (predta_coacc d a0) (map_mini state d) n) a1 = Some true : preDTA -> ad -> ad -> Prop
in_M0_false : forall (A : Set) (a : A), ~ (exists e : ad, MapGet A (M0 A) e = Some a)
coacc_ind : forall P : preDTA -> ad -> ad -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> P d a a) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad), MapGet state d a2 = Some s2 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl a2 -> coacc d a0 a1 -> P d a0 a1 -> P d a0 a2) -> forall (p : preDTA) (a a0 : ad), coacc p a a0 -> P p a a0
preDTA_ref_ok_def : forall d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok d < -> (forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_ref_ok s d)
semantic_equiv_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance d a t -> rec_term d a t (essence t d) = true
predta_coacc_def_ok : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (m : Map bool), ensemble_base state d (predta_coacc d a m)
semantic_equiv_1_2 : forall d : preDTA, pre_reconnait d prec_empty tnil (rec_empty d)
in_M1_id : forall (A : Set) (a : A) (x : ad) (e : A), (exists c : ad, MapGet A (M1 A x e) c = Some a) -> a = e
conservation_5 : forall (d : preDTA) (hd : term) (tl : term_list) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), S (essence hd d) <= essence_list (tcons hd tl) d (prec_cons a la ls)
predta_coacc_rev : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (m : Map bool) (b : ad), MapGet bool (predta_coacc d a m) b = Some true -> ensemble_base state d m -> (exists (a0 : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet state d a0 = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p /\ prec_occur p b /\ MapGet bool m a0 = Some true) \/ a = b
map_or_mapget_true_ld : forall (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad), ensemble_base state d m0 -> ensemble_base state d m1 -> MapGet bool m0 a = Some true -> MapGet bool (map_or m0 m1) a = Some true
map_or_mapget_true_rd : forall (d : preDTA) (m0 m1 : Map bool) (a : ad), ensemble_base state d m0 -> ensemble_base state d m1 -> MapGet bool m1 a = Some true -> MapGet bool (map_or m0 m1) a = Some true
prec_list_ref_ok_check = fix prec_list_ref_ok_check (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA) {struct p} : bool := match p with | prec_cons a la ls => addr_in_dta_check d a && (prec_list_ref_ok_check la d && prec_list_ref_ok_check ls d) | prec_empty => true end : prec_list -> preDTA -> bool
pl_coacc_rev : forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (a : ad), MapGet bool (pl_coacc d pl) a = Some true -> prec_occur pl a
essence = fun (t : term) (d : preDTA) => S (term_high t) * S (DTA_taille d) : term -> preDTA -> nat
predta_coacc_contain_coacc_ads_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a0 a : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list) (b : ad) (m : Map bool), preDTA_ref_ok d -> MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> prec_occur p b -> ensemble_base state d m -> MapGet bool m a = Some true -> MapGet bool (predta_coacc d a0 m) b = Some true
pl_coacc_contain_coacc_ads : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_occur p a -> prec_list_ref_ok p d -> MapGet bool (pl_coacc d p) a = Some true
map_replace_def_ok_d : forall (d : preDTA) (m : Map bool) (a : ad) (x : bool), ensemble_base state d m -> ensemble_base state d (map_replace bool m a x)
lattice_bounded_5 : forall (p : prechain bool) (A : Set) (m0 m1 : Map A), sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A (M2 A m0 m1)) lem p -> exists p0 p1 : prechain bool, sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m0) lem p0 /\ sas_chain bool (ensemble_base A m1) lem p1 /\ lem (M2 bool (prechain_last bool p0) (prechain_last bool p1)) (prechain_last bool p) /\ chain_length bool p0 + chain_length bool p1 = S (chain_length bool p)
map_mini_mini : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A), mini bool lem (ensemble_base A x) (map_mini A x)
map_maxi_maxi : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A), maxi bool lem (ensemble_base A x) (map_maxi A x)
